name: Enterprise Galaxy
description:
Enterprise Galaxy is a 3D platformer written for the 4mb game jam.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Mouse to rotate the camera
  • Space to jump
  • f11 to toggle fullscreen mode

This is an early submission due to the closing deadline. For now, the game is very minimal with just one big level.

In the very near future, the following features will be added:

  • Better graphics (actual textures & lighting)
  • More levels and platform types
  • In-game timer for speedrunning
  • Fixing collision bugs
